document.full_text: rafael nadal beat david ferrer 6-2, 6-4 in their second all-spanish final in two weeks to claim his sixth barcelona open title on sunday.
document.title: nadal rolls past ferrer to win barcelona open for sixth time
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal beat david ferrer 6-2, 6-4 in their second all-spanish final in two weeks to claim his sixth barcelona open title on sunday.
